divs: sighting detailssighting report: febuary 5, 2005. around 8:30. hazy\ alittle bit cloudy. close encounter of the first kind (ufo appeared not to notice surroundings or witnesses). color: blue,red,yellow,orange. triangular w\ lights at each corner w\ one light in middle, blinking. the top light was brightest. near east horizon. heading north. went in diamond formation, disapeered the reappeared in the diamond formation. traveled slowly. stopped and headed south, then went back. after five minutes, it slowed down then sped back up many times. encounter was approximintly ten minuteslong.
